result.eng: Give me a drop of water please.
result.ga: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dom braon uisce le do thoilGive me a drop of water please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom braon uisce le do ṫoilGive me a drop of water please.

result.html: Tabhair an gunna leatTake the gun with you.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair an gunna leatTake the gun with you.

result.eng: Visit me when you're in the country.
result.ga: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.orig: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tír
result.html: Tabhair cuairt orm nuair a bheidh tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair cuairt orm nuair a ḃeiḋ tú sa tírVisit me when you're in the country.

result.ga: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dom an leabhar le do thoilGive me the book please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair dom an leaḃar le do ṫoilGive me the book please.

result.eng: Give me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ga: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a Mhama
result.orig: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a Mhama
result.html: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a MhamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair gloine sú oráiste dom a ṀamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.

result.eng: Give us two notebooks and two pencils, please.
result.ga: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil
result.orig: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoil
result.html: Tabhair dhá chóipleabhar agus dhá pheann luaidhe dúinn le do thoilGive us two notebooks and two pencils, please.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair ḋá ċóipleaḃar agus ḋá ṗeann luaiḋe dúinn le do ṫoilGive us two notebooks and two pencils, please.

result.eng: Well, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ga: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.orig: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárach
result.html: Bhuel tabhair an carr seo ann amárachWell, take the car there tomorrow.
result.ponchtml: Ḃuel taḃair an carr seo ann amáraċWell, take the car there tomorrow.
